bibl.title: Pottery Sherds for Writing: An Overview of the Practice
bibl.seg: Clementina Caputo, Pottery Sherds for Writing: An Overview of the Practice.
Clementina Caputo & Julia Lougovaya (edd.), Using Ostraca in the Ancient World. New Discoveries and Methodologies = Materiale Textkulturen. 32 (Berlin - Boston, 2020) pp. 31-58, figg.

1. Counting sherds: some key case studies from Egypt. - 2. Possible criteria of selection: while the choice of writing materials was generally dictated by practical needs, including the immediate availability of certain ceramic types versus others, it is evident that specific selection criteria were also at play. - 3. Conclusions.
